Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Yaadhaamoruvar Oru Viseshiththa Poruththanai Panniyirundhaal, Poruththanai Pannappattavargal Un Madhippinpadi Karththarukku Uriyavargal.
3 irubadhu Vayadhumudhal Arubadhu Vayadhukkutpatta Aanpillaiyai Nee Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkalaagiya Aimbadhu Vellichchekkalaagavum,
4 penpillaiyai Muppadhu Sekkalaagavum Madhippaayaaga.
5 aindhu Vayadhumudhal Irubadhu Vayadhukku Utpatta Aanpillaiyai Irubadhu Sekkalaagavum, Penpillaiyai Paththuchchekkalaagavum,
6 oru Maadhammudhal Aindhu Vayadhukku Utpatta Aanpillaiyai Aindhu Vellichchekkalaagavum, Penpillaiyai Moondru Vellichchekkalaagavum,
7 arubadhu Vayadhu Thodangi, Adharku Merpatta Vayadhulla Aanpillaiyaip Padhinaindhu Sekkalaagavum, Penpillaiyaip Paththuchchekkalaagavum Madhikkakkadavaai.

8 un Madhippinpadi Seluththak Koodaadha Dhariththiranaayirundhaal, Avan Aasaariyanukku Munbaaga Vandhu Nirkakkadavan; Aasaariyan Avanai Madhippaanaaga; Poruththanai Panninavanudaiya Thraanikketrapadi Aasaariyan Avanai Madhikkakkadavan.
9 oruvan Poruththanai Panninadhu Karththarukkup Paliyidappadaththakka Miruga Jeevanaanaal Avan Karththarukkuk Kodukkira Appadippattadhellaam Parisuththamaayiruppadhaaga.

10 adhai Maatraamalum Verupaduththaamalum Iruppaanaaga; Ilappamaanadharkup Padhilaaga Nalamaanadhaiyum, Nalamaanadharkup Padhilaaga Ilappamaanadhaiyum Seluththaamal Iruppaanaaga; Avan Mirugaththukkup Padhilaaga Mirugaththai Maatrikkoduppaanaagil, Appozhudhu Adhuvum Adharkup Padhilaagak Koduththadhum Parisuththamaayiruppadhaaga.
11 adhu Karththarukkup Paliyidappadaththagaadha Suththamillaadha Yaadhoru Mirugamaanaal, Adhai Aasaariyanukku Munbaaga Niruththakkadavan.
12 aasaariyan Adhu Nalladhaanaalum Ilappamaanadhaanaalum Adhai Madhippaanaaga; Un Madhippinpadiye Irukkakkadavadhu.
13 adhai Meettukkollamanadhaayirundhaanaagil, Un Madhippode Aindhil Oru Pangaik Koottikkodukkakkadavan.

14 oruvan Thanveettaik Karththarukkup Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukondaal, Aasaariyan Adhin Nalaththukkum Ilappaththukkum Thakkadhaaga Adhai Madhikkakkadavan; Aasaariyan Madhikkirapadi Adhu Irukkakkadavadhu.

15 than Veettaip Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukondavan Adhai Meettukkolla Manadhaayirundhaal, Nee Madhikkum Dhiraviyaththode Aindhil Oru Pangaik Koottikkodukkakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanudaiyadhaagum.

16 oruvan Than Kaaniyaatchiyaana Vayalil Yaadhoru Pangaik Karththarukkup Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukondaal, Un Madhippu Adhin Vidhaippukkuththakkadhaai Irukkavendum; Oru Kalam Vaarkodhumai Vidhaikkira Vayal Aimbadhu Vellichchekkalaaga Madhikkappadavendum.
17 yoopili Varushamudhal Avan Than Vayalaip Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukondaal, Adhu Un Madhippinpadi Irukkavendum.

18 yoopili Varushaththukkuppin Than Vayalaip Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukondaanaanaal, Yoopili Varushammattumulla Matravarushangalinpadiye Aasaariyan Dhiraviyaththaik Kanakkuppaarththu, Adharkuththakkadhu Un Madhippile Thallappadavendum.

19 vayalaip Parisuththam Endru Nerndhu Kondavan Adhai Meettukkolla Manadhaayirundhaal, Un Madhippaana Dhiraviyaththode Aindhil Oru Pangaikkoottik Kodukkakkadavan; Appozhudhu Adhu Avanukku Urudhiyaagum.
20 avan Vayalai Meettukkollaamal, Vayalai Veroruvanukku Vitruppottaal, Adhu Thirumba Meetkappadaamal,
21 yoopili Varushaththil Meetkappadumpodhu, Saabaththeedaana Vayalaagak Karththarukkendru Niyamikkappattadhaayirukkakkadavadhu; Adhu Aasaariyanukkuk Kaaniyaatchiyaagum.
22 oruvan Thanakkuk Kaaniyaatchi Vayalaayiraamal Thaan Vilaikku Vaangina Oru Vayalaik Karththarukkup Parisuththam Endru Nerndhukondaal,

23 adhu Yoopili Varushammattum, Un Madhippinpadi Perum Vilai Innadhendru Aasaariyan Avanode Kanakkuppaarththu, Andha Un Madhippai, Karththarukkup Parisuththamaayirukkumpadi, Avan Annaalile Kodukkakkadavan.
24 yaar Kaiyile Andha Vayalaik Kondaano, Andhak Kaaniyaatchikkaaran Vasamaai Adhu Yoopili Varushaththil Thirumba Serum.
25 un Madhippellaam Parisuththa Sthalaththu Sekkal Kanakkaayirukkakkadavadhu; Oru Sekkalaanadhu Irubadhu Keraa.
26 thalaiyeetraanavaigal Karththarudaiyadhu, Aagaiyaal Oruvarum Thalaiyeetraagiya Mirugajeevanaip Parisuththam Endru Nerndhu Kollalaagaadhu; Adhu Maadaanaalum Aadaanaalum Karththarudaiyadhu.

27 suththamillaadha Mirugaththinudaiya Thalaiyeetraanaal, Adhai Avan Un Madhippinpadi Meettukkondu, Adhanudane Aindhil Oru Pangaik Koottikkodukkakkadavan; Meetkappadaadhirundhaal, Un Madhippinpadi Adhu Virkappadakkadavadhu.

28 oruvan Than Vasaththilulla Narajeevanilaavadhu, Mirugajeevanilaavadhu, Kaaniyaatchi Nilaththilaavadhu, Edhaiyaagilum Karththarukkendru Saabaththeedaaga Nerndhukondaal, Adhu Virkappadavum Meetkappadavum Koodaadhu; Nerndhukollappattavaigalellaam Karththarukkaagap Parisuththamaayirukkum.
29 narajeevanil Saabaththeedaaga Niyamikkappattavaigalellaam Meetkappadaamal Kolaiseyyappadakkadavadhu.
30 dhesaththile Nilaththin Viththilum, Virutchangalin Kaniyilum, Thasamapaagam Ellaam Karththarukku Uriyadhu; Adhu Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanadhu.
31 oruvan Than Thasamapaagaththile Evvalavaavadhu Meettukkolla Manadhaayirundhaanaanaal, Adhanudan Aindhil Oru Pangaik Koottikkodukkakkadavan.
32 kolin Keezhppatta Aadumaadugalile Paththil Oru Pangaagiradhellaam Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanadhu.

33 adhu Nalladho Ilappamaanadho Endru Avan Paarkkavendaam; Adhai Maatravum Vendaam; Maatrinaal, Adhuvum Adharkup Padhilaagak Kodukkappattadhumaagiya Irandum Parisuththamaagum; Adhu Meetkappadak Koodaadhendru Avargalode Sol Endraar.
34 isravel Puththirarukku Sollumpadi, Karththar Seenaaimalaiyil Mosekku Vidhiththa Kattalaigal Ivaigale.
